H0.text: What fairy tale features a wolf who tries to “huff and puff and blow your house in”. Little Red Riding Hood

H1.text: What fairy tale features a wolf who tries to “huff and puff and blow your house in”. The Boy Who Cried Wolf

H2.text: What fairy tale features a wolf who tries to “huff and puff and blow your house in”. Goldilocks and the Three Bears

H3.text: What fairy tale features a wolf who tries to “huff and puff and blow your house in”. 3 Little Pigs

A4.text: The Big Bad Wolf blows down the first two pigs' houses which are made of straw and sticks respectively

A5.text: but is unable to destroy the third pig's house that is made of bricks
